Package src.main.mvc.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
src.main.mvc.controller.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, KeyListener, EventListener
public class GameController extends Object implements ActionListener, KeyListener
This class is the controller of the game. It contains the game loop and the methods to update at different state in the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController(MapModel map, MenuFrame mainframe, PacmanModel pacman, List<GhostModel> ghostlist)
      This constructor creates the GameController.
      Parameters:
      map - The map of the game.
      mainframe - The JFrame of the game.
      pacman - The Pacman of the game.
      ghostlist - The list of the ghosts in the game.

  • Method Details

    • game

      public void game()
      This method runs the game loop until either the player runs out of lives or all the dots on the map are eaten. It updates the direction of the Pacman depending on the user inputs and moves the Pacman accordingly. It also checks for collisions with other game objects and updates the score accordingly.

    • checkCell

      public boolean checkCell()
      Checks if the cell in front of Pacman is a valid move.
      Returns:
      true if the cell is not a wall, false otherwise.

    • checkCollision

      public void checkCollision(HashMap<String,Point> basePositions)
      Checks for collision between Pacman and ghosts, and decrements Pacman's lives if there is a collision.

    • spawnItem

      public void spawnItem(List<FruitModel> fruits, Clock timer)
      Spawns a fruit item on the game map if certain conditions are met.
      Parameters:
      fruits - a list of FruitModel objects to choose from for spawning

    • addListeners

      public void addListeners(Component[] cmp)
      This method adds listeners to the components.
      Parameters:
      cmp - The components to add listeners.

    • removeListeners

      public void removeListeners(Component[] cmp)
      This method removes listeners to the components.
      Parameters:
      cmp - The components to remove listeners.

    • checkNextPosition

      public void checkNextPosition(src.main.mvc.controller.GameController.nextDirection nextdirection)
      This method checks if the next position of the Pacman is valid.
      Parameters:
      nextdirection - The next direction of the Pacman.

    • reset

      public void reset()
      This method is to reset all the variables of the game. It is used when the player wants to play again.

    • actionPerformed

      public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method processes the user inputs on Menu panel.
      Specified by:
      actionPerformed in interface ActionListener
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the event to be processed

      Specified by:

    • keyPressed

      public void keyPressed(KeyEvent keyEvent)
      Specified by:
      keyPressed in interface KeyListener

    • keyReleased

      public void keyReleased(KeyEvent keyEvent)
      This method processes the user inputs and updates the direction of the Pacman. Z,Q,S,D and the arrow keys are used to move the Pacman. Left, Right, Up, Down are used to move the Pacman.
      Specified by:
      keyReleased in interface KeyListener
      Parameters:
      keyEvent - the event to be processed

    • updateScore

      public void updateScore(String name, int score)
      This method updates the score of a player in the file leaderboard.txt. It updates the score of the player if it is higher than the previous one.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the player.
      score - The score of the player.
